caption: A punchy garage rock track with fuzzy guitars, driving drums, and raw energetic vocals. Features lo-fi production aesthetic, catchy riffs, and a back-to-basics rock and roll attitude.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Friday night and I'm feeling alive
Gonna rock this town till the sun arrives
Turn it up don't turn it down
We're the loudest band in this whole town

[Chorus]
Rock and roll will never die
Raise your fist up to the sky
Play it loud and play it proud
We're here to rock this crowd

[Verse 2]
Sweat is dripping amps are blown
This is everything we've ever known
No fancy tricks just three chords true
This one goes out to you

[Chorus]
Rock and roll will never die
Raise your fist up to the sky
Play it loud and play it proud
We're here to rock this crowd

[Bridge]

One two three four!

[Outro]
Rock and roll!
Rock and roll!
